name: htmx-go-example
description: A [Go](https://go.dev/) web application made in the spirit of the [official Flask example][htmx-proj] application that accompanies the book [Hypermedia Systems][htmx-book]. You can use this application as a starting point to follow along with the book starting at [HTMX Patterns](https://hypermedia.systems/htmx-patterns/).
author: Tim Goshinski <tim@code-chimp.com>
